headline: Reckitt to Sell Home-Care Unit Majority Stake to Advent at Up to $4.8 Billion Valuation
summary: The consumer-goods company is selling a majority stake in its home-care business to Advent International as it looks to sharpen its focus on core brands.

raw.headline: Reckitt to Sell Home-Care Unit Majority Stake to Advent at Up to $4.8 Billion Valuation
